translation.not-found: Looks like you BROKE SOMETHING. It's fine, just go back and we'll keep this a secret.
translation.under-construction-text: Sorry, we're doing some work on the site!
translation.signIn-description: Sign in to view your Favorites or just pick up right where you left off.
translation.signUp-description: Your account lets you save items to your favorites.
translation.errors-required: This field is required. Maybe it's a ghost. Boo.
translation.errors-email: Please enter a valid email address. (example@mail.com).
translation.successful-registration: You have registered successfully! Please use the credentials chosen to login.
translation.install-pscbreaks-detailed: Install this application on your homescreen for quick and easy access on the go.
translation.added-to-cart-content: You can go to cart to see the next steps, or you can continue shopping.
translation.empty-cart-title: Hey! Your cart is empty, don't you want that 'Zard?!?
translation.cart-explanation: Please contact the seller directly before making the payment to make sure everything that appears here is right.
translation.cart-removal-content: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your bag?
